item.title: Leetcode 132 Palindrome Partitioning II 解题报告
item.description: Leetcode 132 Palindrome Partitioning II 解题报告 Question: Given a string s, partition s such that every substring of the partition is a palindrome. Return the minimum cuts needed for a palindrome partitioning of s. Example: Input: "aab" Output: 1 Explanation: The palindrome partitioning ["aa","b"] could be produced using 1 cut. Solution: Approach #1: DP dp[i][j] - min cut substring from i to j init
